DOC.brief_summary: The investigator want know whether intravenous ascorbic acid would reduce blood loss laparoscopic myoma surgery . The investigator randomize patient intravenous ascorbic acid group placebo group examine blood loss group .
DOC.brief_title: Study Effect Intravenous Ascorbic Acid Intraoperative Blood Loss Women With Uterine Myoma
DOC.criteria: uterine myoma planning laparoscopic myomectomy image ; number myoma < 4 image ; diameter large myoma < 9cm planning surgery addition laparoscopy clinically significant coagulation abnormality
